document.full_text: the chicago blackhawks rewarded rookie netminder corey crawford with a new three-year contract after recording 33 wins in his debut campaign, the nhl team said on thursday.
document.title: blackhawks ink netminder crawford to three-year deal
lines_and_colors: the chicago blackhawks rewarded rookie netminder corey crawford with a new three-year contract after recording 33 wins in his debut campaign, the nhl team said on thursday.
